titles.title: To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal certain disclosure requirements related to coal and mine safety.
To amend the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal certain disclosure requirements related to coal and mine safety.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by the Yeas and Nays: 33 - 25.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 115-571.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 431.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act to repeal coal and other mine safety reporting requirements for issuers of securities.
